webscript.shortname: The Webscript for GET Calendar by ID
webscript.description:
JSON Returned:
{
 "status":
 {
  "code": Integer,
  "text": String
 },
 "calendar":
 {
  "events":
  [
   {
    "summary": String,
    "location": String,
    "description": String,
    "dtstamp": String,
    "uid": String,
    "dtstart": String,
    "dtend": String
    "allDay": String
    "class": String
   }
  ],
  "vtimezone":
  {
   "x-lic-location": String,
   "tzurl": String,
   "tzid": String
  },
  "properties":
  {
   "version": String,
   "color": String,
   "prodid": String,
   "displayname": String
  }
 }
}
